briefTitle: First Line Metastatic Breast Cancer Treatment (ESMERALDA)
officialTitle: A PHASE II TRIAL EVALUATING THE COMBINATION OF ERIBULIN (HALAVEN®) + BEVACIZUMAB (AVASTIN®) AS A FIRST LINE TREATMENT IN PATIENTS WITH METASTATIC HER2- BREAST CANCER
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of patient with non progressive disease
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age \> 18 ans
* Patient with metastatic mammary adenocarcinoma
* Hormone receptors ER and PR positive or negative for HER 2 negative

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior chemotherapy for metastatic disease
* Previous treatment with eribulin or bevacizumab
* Presence of symptomatic brain metastases or meningeal
